alert.note: Alert for Oktibbeha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 27 at 5:24PM CDT until April 27 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN OKTIBBEHA...SOUTHEASTERN CLAY AND CENTRAL LOWNDES COUNTIES... At 523 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Muldrow, or near West Point, moving east at 20 mph. This severe thunderstorm produced hail as large as golf balls north of Starkville. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... West Point and Tibbee around 540 PM CDT. Waverly around 605 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
